page.title: 03Goings-on in Pontefract.
page.content: We have had a look at the local newspaper,the Pontefract and Castleford Express. { PIT JOBS FURY.}Still suffering from the 12 month strike the economy took a terrible blow this week. 3 150 jobs will be lost,said the N.C.B this week. {ANGRY MUMS VOW TO DUMP RUBBISH. }A house wife in Pontefract has said that her rubbish has not been collected for seven weeks. Nevison,Half Penny Lane Chequerfield have been waiting longer. {OUT!}School children at Park High went out on strike for 10 days because of the teachers ban on voluntary jobs. {MOVE US!}A man whose house was cold and damp says his baby died of this problem.There were 2 babys one was 7 months old and the other one was 21 months.The 7 month baby is in hospital and the other one has died. by Ruth Robinson & Sarah Haigh age 10
